ISSUE.TITLE: Broken "submit a PR" link
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The "submit a PR" link at [https://github.com/r-spacex/SpaceX-API/blob/master/docs/apps.md](https://github.com/r-spacex/SpaceX-API/blob/master/docs/apps.md) links to a nonexistent CONTRIBUTING.md file, resulting in 404 page.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #780 from r-spacex/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/eslint-7.26.0 Bump eslint from 7.25.0 to 7.26.0
